titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the 3d Infantry Division.
A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the 3d Infantry Division.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the 3d Infantry Division on November 21, 2017, and reveres its century of service to the military of the United States.
